#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ullint;
template <typename CustomDataType>
void fastread(CustomDataType *a)
{
	char c=0; *a=0;
	while(c<33){c=getchar_unlocked();}
	while(c>33){*a=(*a<<3)+(*a<<1)+c-'0'; c=getchar_unlocked();}
	return;
}//fastread ends

int main()
{
	int cases;
	ullint num1,num2;
	fastread(&cases);
	while(cases--)
	{
		fastread(&num1);
		fastread(&num2);
		cout<<num1*num2-num2-num1<<endl;
	}//all cases end
	return 0;
}//main ends
